roleset.name: steer

example.name: agent and path
example.text: The Federal Reserve Board's plan for a ``soft landing,'' he says, requires the Fed to navigate ``an ever-narrowing corridor.''

example.name: with vessel
example.text: John navigated his car through the maze of shopping carts in the parking lot.
example.arg: through the maze of shopping carts in the parking lot
